intro: Explore the principles of Stoicism and how they can be applied in daily life.
quote1: Life is what our thoughts make it.
quote2: Do not demand that things happen as you wish, but wish them to happen as they do, and you will go on well.
quote3: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
resource3: Stoicism as a Philosophy for Living (Website)
stoicismExplanation: Stoicism is a philosophy of life that teaches virtue, wisdom, and self-control as the path to happiness. It originated in ancient Greece and was popularized by figures such as Marcus Aurelius, Seneca, and Epictetus.
